text: Yelp please take this down this restuarant has not been here for multiple years. Thank You

When In Scarborough there is a small restaurant called golden sun. It's in a strip mall but the food is awesome. The portions are large and the prices are much less then you would expect to pay for quality food.
SUPER AWESOME COMFORT FOOD FOUND HERE. Great prices fantastic food and HUGE servings.  This place has become my new addiction.
